name: VoiplyAssistant
0:
”Alexa, open Voiply”
”play all my messages.”
”send a text message”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: voiply
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Using the Voiply skill with Alexa, the voice assistant on your Amazon Echo, allows you to tap into your Voiply service with voice commands. Anyone can use this skill to make calls, send text messages, and Voiply customers can even listen to voicemails using voice commands.

* Send SMS text messages
* Initiate Phone calls
* Check/manage voicemail
